TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Luye, title = Luye, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luye} }

S.FORM: luye guan ('inamizukuan: shikano, pinairangan: Lo̍k-iá-hiong, nginaingayngan: Luk Iaˊ Hiongˊ/Lu̍k-yâ-hiông) imaza i pasakacedas a vecekadan tua taiwan a taituking, a i viri ciul mavan a guansan cen, a pasamaza i ledepan i viri kicencen nakipuljaqedi ta haydan gu, a i tjaikacedas mavan a dunghe, a i tjaikaledep kata pasanavalj nakicaing tua i yanping. tucu i luye guan izua alu kuzulj a caucau, a pairang qevas 40%, a haka qevas 30%, a ilizulizuk a kacalisian qevas 20%, a zuma a caucau qevas 10%, izua mare maljimalji a zuku au natemalidu a kudakudan. pakata kinapangaljan a paljavak, izua luye, lungtien, yungan, rilung, riyan, rihe, rivung a matapitju a mula qinaljan. aza nugiu qevas qemuma izua 70%, avan nu nugiuan a qinaljan. cinalivatan aicu a luye ka cinting a djiday sipavecik a paljavak ta pakuangsiang a kicapilj. ka ripunanga a djiday pavalitan ta taidu ting guansan djin luye zuang , kapuamin a maqaqeci pavalitan ta luye guan, ljakua aza a parikunghu sa kanrivi, izua sanye , zungye , siaye sipavecik a tjemevetjevelj a masan lusan mula, au sipaljavak ta yanping guan. izua drusa a kasizuan a kai a pakata luye gu, kasicuayan aicu a imaza cemelcemelan a kadjunangan, izua nu semamamaza a venan a kemin ta kakanan, sika papungadanan ta "luye" aya. a masanitalj a kai, ka ripun a djiday, nalemindjelj aza ripun ta sipatjavat a kaizuanan nua uri sekawmalj a caucau, masa pasekaumalj ta luye nugiu a pasasingsi guan, ripun pavalitan a sicuayan a kangadanan a "luljaw" a masan "luye", au kapuamin ta maqaqeci, avananga a ngadan a patje tucu. kemasi taidu hici, makamaza i masansivalj a djalanan a taiwan pasaviri, cemalivat tua izua lusepitj a luye maruqalu, sa cemalivat uta ta luye pana, mapacungangan tjaljaqacaqaca a kazatjazatjan a kadjunangan, aicu avan a kakaian a kemasi tjai kamakama a taidu cizu a ti hucuan a pukai, "tjaljatjaljiqacaqacan a kazatjazatjan i valangaw" aya, avananga kinapalak laulju a kadjunangan, aicu a luye, nakakaizuanan nu venan, qaqinacapan na kacalisian, avan tauta a tjaljasansanguwaqan a kinaizuanan aya ripun. nuka zua nasekemasikeledep a sikataqaljan pinaka paravac niamadju a kakaizuanan a kadjunangan, ljakua tucu, avananga zua nakitjawla ta kumuyin a kakaizuanan, avan nu tauta a riuku naamasanpazangal a kakiunangan. paljavak tua kadjunangan matja pitju qinaljan i luye. matja pitju qinaljan imaza, parayapay , rekat , efong , pakala'ac , pailasan , salinliw , kanao'pu . guciu caucau nasidjaravacan aicu a luye imaza i kemasi kalinku a sema taitu sevesevec a lizulizuk, sipacacekelan na taqaljaqaljan, izua kisiya a djalan a cemalivat tua taiwan i taitu kata masansivalj a djalanan i taiwan makamaza. sinupuan kivangvangan 武陵綠色隧道 wuling qetjung 新良濕地 sinljang djukal 鹿野高台 luye na lja vavaw a kadjunangan kemasi 2011 patagilj ljemita cavilj panri ta " taiwan siniaya ta sapuy a paljevavaw a bulu a kamuku" racev

loye goan ('inamizokoan: shikano, pinairangan: Lo̍k-iá-hiong, nginaingayngan: Lok Iaˊ Hiongˊ/Lo̍k-yâ-hiông) imaza i pasakacedas a vecekadan toa taiwan a taitoking, a i viri ciol mavan a goansan cen, a pasamaza i ledepan i viri kicencen nakipoljaqedi ta haydan go, a i tjaikacedas mavan a donghe, a i tjaikaledep kata pasanavalj nakicaing toa i yanping. toco i loye goan izoa alo kozolj a caocao, a pairang qevas 40%, a haka qevas 30%, a ilizolizok a kacalisian qevas 20%, a zoma a caocao qevas 10%, izoa mare maljimalji a zoko ao natemalido a kodakodan. pakata kinapangaljan a paljavak, izoa loye, longtien, yongan, rilong, riyan, rihe, rivong a matapitjo a mola qinaljan. aza nogio qevas qemoma izoa 70%, avan no nogioan a qinaljan. cinalivatan aico a loye ka cinting a djiday sipavecik a paljavak ta pakoangsiang a kicapilj. ka riponanga a djiday pavalitan ta taido ting goansan djin loye zoang , kapoamin a maqaqeci pavalitan ta loye goan, ljakoa aza a parikongho sa kanrivi, izoa sanye , zongye , siaye sipavecik a tjemevetjevelj a masan losan mola, ao sipaljavak ta yanping goan. izoa drosa a kasizoan a kai a pakata loye go, kasicoayan aico a imaza cemelcemelan a kadjonangan, izoa no semamamaza a venan a kemin ta kakanan, sika papongadanan ta "loye" aya. a masanitalj a kai, ka ripon a djiday, nalemindjelj aza ripon ta sipatjavat a kaizoanan noa ori sekawmalj a caocao, masa pasekaomalj ta loye nogio a pasasingsi goan, ripon pavalitan a sicoayan a kangadanan a "loljaw" a masan "loye", ao kapoamin ta maqaqeci, avananga a ngadan a patje toco. kemasi taido hici, makamaza i masansivalj a djalanan a taiwan pasaviri, cemalivat toa izoa losepitj a loye maroqalo, sa cemalivat ota ta loye pana, mapacongangan tjaljaqacaqaca a kazatjazatjan a kadjonangan, aico avan a kakaian a kemasi tjai kamakama a taido cizo a ti hocoan a pokai, "tjaljatjaljiqacaqacan a kazatjazatjan i valangaw" aya, avananga kinapalak laoljo a kadjonangan, aico a loye, nakakaizoanan no venan, qaqinacapan na kacalisian, avan taota a tjaljasansangowaqan a kinaizoanan aya ripon. noka zoa nasekemasikeledep a sikataqaljan pinaka paravac niamadjo a kakaizoanan a kadjonangan, ljakoa toco, avananga zoa nakitjawla ta komoyin a kakaizoanan, avan no taota a rioko naamasanpazangal a kakionangan. paljavak toa kadjonangan matja pitjo qinaljan i loye. matja pitjo qinaljan imaza, parayapay , rekat , efong , pakala'ac , pailasan , salinliw , kanao'po . gocio caocao nasidjaravacan aico a loye imaza i kemasi kalinko a sema taito sevesevec a lizolizok, sipacacekelan na taqaljaqaljan, izoa kisiya a djalan a cemalivat toa taiwan i taito kata masansivalj a djalanan i taiwan makamaza. sinopoan kivangvangan 武陵綠色隧道 woling qetjong 新良濕地 sinljang djokal 鹿野高台 loye na lja vavaw a kadjonangan kemasi 2011 patagilj ljemita cavilj panri ta " taiwan siniaya ta sapoy a paljevavaw a bolo a kamoko" racev
